profile: Mason Painting & Services is a full service painting company. We have over 20 years of experience and specialize in Interior and exterior, residential and commercial painting. We also offer a variety of services including but not limited to, drywall repair, cabinet and staircase refinishing, pressure washing and deck staining. We service the areas of West GTA, including but not limited to Hamilton, Burlington, Niagara, St Catherine's and Mississauga. Call us for a free estimate today at (905)-462-1541

 We also offer Deck staining, painting, fence painting, brick painting spraying & much more!

profile:
ESP Construction works all over the GTA Area. We are strongly committed to providing high quality of craftsmanship and customer service to each and every customer, no matter the size of the job. Over eighty percent of our business is from repeat and referral customers. This success stems, in part, from the reputation ESP Construction has built over the past 8 years. 

Our services are:

Interior remodeling, Insurance claims, Office developments, Restorations, Drywall Installation, Metal Framing, Plaster, Taping, Renovations, Kitchens, Custom Mill-work, and Insulation. 

While other companies may send their representatives to your home, the owner of ESP Construction personally estimates each job and works side-by-side with you on every aspect of your project from start to finish. We are a start to finish company, we will get your work done in a timely manner and minimize any down time that may occur during your project.

ESP Construction is licensed and fully insured. For your protection we carry both liability and workmen’s compensation insurance on all workers and employees. Our Company stand behind all work performed and backs all projects with a full 1 year warranty.

ESP Construction offers comprehensive construction services and is dedicated to ensuring complete satisfaction on each and every job. Whether you want a repair or fully renovate you home, our team of professional craftsmen can transform your wish list into the reality of a beautifully remodeled home.
services: Insurance claims, Office developments, Restorations, Drywall Installation, Metal Framing, Plaster, Taping, Renovations, Kitchens, Custom Mill-work, and Insulation.
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on service completed.
name: Esp Construction

Welcome to Minor Detail Matters. We offer full service drywall and painting services. For drywall we offer: Patching, skim coating, plaster, repairs, installation, removal and demolition, taping, and corner bead.

We also offer a variety of Painting Services which include: spray paint, doors and trim, interior and exterior, caulking, ceilings, and walls. We offer free onsite estimates and will work with you to complete the job to your satisfaction.

Contact us today to schedule your appointment. We're looking forward to working with you.

profile:
Welcome to Drywallers.ca! Known as Marjo and Company until 2014, Drywallers.ca originated as Mark and Joanne Beattie in 1986. At the time, both pushed pink insulation every day and made sure there was always work, food, and smiles.  Operating one the principles of honesty, trust, and reliability - the small business began to grow. It didn't take long for Mark to establish a reputation of sincerity and hard work in Simcoe County. Today, Mark and Kyle manage the crews together and continue to grow Drywallers.ca Inc into a fun, welcoming, and exciting place of work. With a focus on learning, safety, and top quality, the values of a small "Mom and Pop Shop" are the building blocks of our business.
 
We look forward to working with you.
services: steel stud framing acoustical drop ceilings taping texture removal and knockdown ceiling basement renovations and new builds
name: Drywallers.Ca

profile:
Fresh Air Abatement is a company that specializes in asbestos, lead abatement removal projects and everything in between. Our team has the tools and experience necessary to have your project! We service the areas of Toronto & GTA, including but not limited to Brampton, Mississauga, Vaughan, downtown Toronto, Collington, and also Pickering. 


Call us for a free quote today at (905) 781-3063! 


Note: Testing is incorporated in our fees, which means we waive the testing fees!
products: We specialize in mold & asbestos removal, including testing of the levels. Moreover, we also do the demolition and the rebuild and clean up.
services: We specialize in the restoration and abatement services in these areas:  Mold & Asbestos removal, testing the material for asbestos levels, water damage control, fire & smoke damage, lead paint removal as well as any hazardous material removal. To add, we do the demolition and rebuild.  We are able to work on high rises inside and out, as well as confined spaces.
name: Fresh Air Abatement Company

profile:
ALF PAINTING SERVICE

If you're looking for a professional painting and home renovation company with years of experience to prove it, then look no further, ALF Painters is the contractor for you. We specialize in interior, exterior, residential, and commercial painting and our services don't stop there! We can also help you with drywall repair and installation, plaster, stucco ceiling repair and removal, carpentry, Kitchen Cabinet repainting, hardwood flooring and much more! Call one of our customer service experts now and be well on your way to a quote and a beautifully transformed property.

Serving Toronto, Mississauga and the grater GTA area!

Remember when you go with ALF Painting Service we value your business and referrals and are committed to getting it done right the first time. GUARANTEED!

Why use Home Painters to paint your house/office?
•Two Year Guarantee On All Work Done
•Full Workers Compensation
•5 Million Liability Insurance
•Fully Bonded Workers (Criminal Background Checks on ALL Workers)
•Thousands of Satisfied Clients
•Top Quality Paints Used Including Benjamin Moore, Dulux, Behr, Sherwin Williams, Para etc
•Drop sheets to Protect Your Floors and Belongings
•100% Satisfaction Guaranteed!!

Interior Painting Services Include:
•Painting (i.e. walls, trim, doors, floors, ceilings, etc.)
•Staining (i.e. banisters, hardwood floors, cabinets, etc.)
•Faux finishing
•Stucco Painting and Repair
•Wallpapering and Removal
•Drywall Repair and Replacement
•Plaster

Exterior Painting Services Include:
•Painting Exterior Surfaces (ie. windows, brick, doors, eaves, soffits, aluminum siding, etc.)
•Deck/Fence Staining and Refinishing
•Power Washing
•Caulking
•Rotten Wood Replacement/Repair

profile:
We are a family-based business based in Toronto, Ontario. Express Paint started out with humble beginnings in 2005 and we have been growing exponentially thanks to you, our loyal customers. We service a vast area within the GTA from Durham to Halton. Your satisfaction is our number one priority and as such, we go beyond our way to complete your project on time, on budget, and with no hiccups.

Our exhaustive skillset allows us to tackle projects of all sizes from residential painting jobs to large-scale commercial projects. In an effort to make the process hassle-free on your part, we also offer a range of services related to painting such as caulking, plaster, and popcorn ceiling removal.
services:
Interior House Painting

- Condo Painting
- Cabinet Painting
- Door and Trim Painting
- Drywall Repair and Installation
- Flattening Popcorn Ceiling

Exterior House Painting

- Aluminum Siding Painting
- Garage Door Painting
- Fence and Deck Staining and Painting

Commercial Painting
specialities:
Interior and Exterior House Painting
Commercial Painting
